sentences.en: 'say, Cad, " he said, looking at her, " you mustn't be nervous.
sentences.cn: “ 喂, 嘉德, " 他看着她说道, " 你千万别紧张.

sentences.en: " Cad,'said he, catching her, " I believe you're getting vain. "
sentences.cn: “ 嘉德, "他一把拉住她说, " 我相信你变虚荣了. ”

sentences.en: Accordingly this promotes the development of die - casting CAD technology.
sentences.cn: 从而也促进了压铸模CAD技术的发展.

sentences.en: Analyze the problem of data exchange technology in existing heterogeneous CAD system.
sentences.cn: 分析了现有的异构CAD系统之间数据交换存在的问题.

sentences.en: Be able to use CAD, prefer : experience with mining industry or industry.
sentences.cn: 熟悉CAD制图, 有矿业或重工业设计经验者优先考虑.

sentences.en: Build, analyse and test product construction with CAD and Prototypes.
sentences.cn: 用CAD和模型,建立 、 分析和测试产品的构造.

sentences.en: CAD and desktop publishing continue to be improved with ever new and faster PCs.
sentences.cn: 电脑辅助设计和小规模出版业随着日新月异的个人电脑而改进.

sentences.en: CAD has substantially increased the number of tumours identified.
sentences.cn: CAD系统明显增加了肿瘤病例的确诊数量.

sentences.en: Data format of CAD often don't accord with requirements of GIS.
sentences.cn: 由于CAD系统与GIS在数据结构上存在着较大的差异,这使得其数据往往不能很好地满足GIS的 要求.

sentences.en: Skillful in using CAD software to design and drawing the parts.
sentences.cn: 具有机械零部件测绘技能,并能熟练使用CAD制图软件.

sentences.en: The aircraft fuel real - time measuring method based on CAD technique is presented.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种基于CAD技术的航空燃油油量 实时 测量方法.

sentences.en: The modularization software and interface with CAD can reduce operating time.
sentences.cn: 软件采用模块化设计,具有与CAD软件的接口,可减少加工工序,缩短加工周期.

sentences.en: When this happens, it's called artery disease ( CAD ).
sentences.cn: 发生这种情况时, 就成为冠心病 ( CAD ).

words.tran_cn: 无赖，下流人；下流男子，卑鄙的男人

n. 计算机辅助设计系统
abbr. 计算机辅助设计工具

trans.tran_cn: computer aided design 计算机辅助设计，Coronary Artery Disease 冠状动脉疾病

trans.tran_en: the use of computers to design industrial products
